body:
Hello Avicus users,

 I used to be a longtime veteran of avicus gameplay, until I started to become inactive for quite some time. Since I have been away for such a long time, I've learned that not many people actually know who I am! I thought it would be appropriate to create an AMA discussion, as I would love to become a member of the community once again and get to know everyone/new people who have joined since the last time i've been on the server. Go ahead and Ask Me Anything :))))


Good To be back :)

title: [AMA] Hi I'm WaffleStacks!

replies.body:
Welcome back my dear friend 

How is life going
How old are you
Whats your favorite color
Whats your favorite food
Sword or bow? Why?

Welcome back!
Hope to see you around!

replies.body:
• Life is Going much better than it was when I quit playing Minecraft
  • I'm 16 now :)
  • Favorite Color has to be Maroon
  • Favorite Food has to be Waffles LOL
  • I've always preferred bow, I'm terrible with swords and stuff with PVP
